text: Tedy Lacap Bruschi (born June 9, 1973) is a former NFL New England Patriots player.Pro-Football-Reference.com, Players, Ted Bruschi. Retrieved February 7, 2012. Bruschi won three Super Bowl rings and was a two-time All-Pro selection. Bruschi joined ESPN as an analyst after leaving football. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:New England Patriots players Category:Sportspeople from San Francisco
title: Tedy Bruschi
